channel.title: Signalr on Kunjan's Web Space
channel.description: Recent content in Signalr on Kunjan's Web Space

item.title: SignalR + Nancy with F# hosted on Azure
item.description: What you feel if you meet your favourite actor? Feeling is wonderful right? Now, add the your actress in the mixture. Have you said WOW??? How about director? Still heart is beating?!? How about having dinner with them? Nothing can be better than that. I am having kinda same feeling. It is nothing new that Nancy is dancing quite comfortable with F#. And thanks to Daniel Mohl we are also having templates to get started with Nancy and F#.
